title: Important features of music streaming services in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response The variety of music available has the highest Share of respondents and Artist exclusives has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response The variety of music available has 35.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Artist exclusives.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response The variety of music available and lowest at Response Artist exclusives.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response The variety of music available has the highest Share of respondents and Artist exclusives has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response The variety of music available has 35.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Artist exclusives.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response The variety of music available and lowest at Response Artist exclusives.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Low price point.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 35.0.
Share of respondents at Response The variety of music available is 81.0 , second place is Low price point at 80.0, and thirdly is The ability to listen on multiple divices at 68.0.
The Response Artist exclusives tends to be 1.27 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 572.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: The ability to listen on multiple divices
Good algorithms to find new music
The ability to combine your music library with your streaming service library
The ability to stream on smart home devices
